channel.title: GitHub Codespace :: CIS 526 Textbook
channel.description: YouTube Video Creating a Codespace To begin, we will start with an empty GitHub repository. You can either create one yourself, or you may be working from a repository provided through GitHub Classroom. At the top of the page, you may see either a Create a Codespace button in an empty repository, or a Code button that opens a panel with a Codespaces tab and a Create Codespace on main button in an initialized repository.
